channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drain cover and footings broken, partly missing and unstable at bottom of slope on turn so I the gap going fast downhill on a bike it going, 10th April
item.description:
At the bottom of the slope where the underpass under main road begins. One day one part of the grate had been removed, it was replaced today, but is incomplete and not stable. Going down the slope on a bike means riders hit it at speed with no warning as it's on a turn. Fortunately I didn't come off the bike, but it seems dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bin, 10th April
item.description:
2nd week in a row the dual bin at the bus stop at the junction of Hucclecote Road & Glos Biz Park has not been emptied. Crew out today but not done. Now overflowing from both litter & recycling.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More fly tipping, 10th April
item.description:
Between 6;00 pm yesterday and 3;00pm today several pieces of furniture have been dumped on the corner of Pates Avenue and Alstone Lane. This is a constant problem and has been for years. Why do you not do anything to deter people using this area as a dumping ground?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Pates Avenue, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary lights on Stoke Road, next to Mill Lane, only go green for 4 seconds, 10th April
item.description:
The temporary traffic lights on Stoke Road next to Mill Lane are set to go green for around 30-60 seconds for southbound traffic, but only around 4 seconds for northbound traffic. They only allow 3 cars, or just a single lorry, through before turning red again. This is causing long delays across the junction. What3words location ///sorry.bunny.jams
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Traffic during 7:30am to 8:30am, 10th April
item.description:
We need a traffic light here, cos traffic cannot get out during school run time and the queue buildup all the way to Pirton Lane (or worse). On coming vehicles do not stop on green to yellow light and lots of them even go with red light on.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues
